channel.title: Utils on Wesley Hales
channel.description: Recent content in Utils on Wesley Hales

item.title: Recovering deleted files from Windows and Linux... and a little forensics
item.description: I got one of those "tech support" phone calls from a family member this weekend, asking if I could help him undelete some files that were deleted by some ghost that snuck into his office ;) You gotta love it when people say they have no idea how an entire folder got deleted and they swear they've been hacked. So I scoured the web to see what exists. For *nix based utils, I think sleuthkit with the autopsy forensics browser is the best out there (that's open source).
